segments.text: Could you bring me some food , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have a bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , the filet mignon was so popular tonight that we ran out . May I suggest the porterhouse ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no filet ? Okay , porterhouse will be fine then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you would like chocolate-covered strawberries with the champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not tonight , but thank you for the suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . This will be charged to your amenities account , okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your food will be brought to you momentarily . I hope you enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2
